articles.title: Second North-South Defence Minister-Level Talks Open
South Side's Delegation Here
articles.content:
South Side's Delegation Here  
   Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the south side with Minister of National Defence Kim Jang Su as chief delegate arrived here Tuesday to participate in the second north-south defence minister-level talks.

En Pyongyang delegacion surena para las conversaciones Norte-Sur
